languages.text: Изящный клинок, закаленный кровью священномучеников, лежит в руке легко и удобно. Черная сталь отполирована с великим усердием, ибо даже во тьме ее хозяин может видеть собственное отражение.
This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.
languages.original_text: Изящный клинок, закаленный кровью священномучеников, лежит в руке легко и удобно. Черная сталь отполирована с великим усердием, ибо даже во тьме ее хозяин может видеть собственное отражение.

traits.locale_text: The elegant blade tempered in the blood of holy martyrs fits easily and comfortably into your hand. The black steel was polished with such extraordinary care that even in the dark, its owner can see their own reflection.

The elegant blade tempered in the blood of holy martyrs fits easily and comfortably into your hand. The black steel was polished with such extraordinary care that even in the dark, its owner can see their own reflection.
This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished to the point where the metal's reflective gleam can be seen even in the dark.
This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.
This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.
This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished to the point where the metal's reflective gleam can be seen even in the dark.
This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.

languages.text: Cette épée élégante, imprégnée du sang des saints martyrs, épouse parfaitement la forme de la main. L'acier noir a été tellement poli que l'éclat réfléchissant du métal demeure visible même dans l'obscurité la plus totale.
languages.original_text: This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.

traits.locale_text: Cette épée élégante, imprégnée du sang des saints martyrs, épouse parfaitement la forme de la main. L'acier noir a été tellement poli que l'éclat réfléchissant du métal demeure visible même dans l'obscurité la plus totale.

languages.text: Esta daga elegante, empapada en la sangre de santos mártires, encaja perfectamente en la mano. Su acero negro está tan pulido que el brillo reflejante del metal puede verse incluso en la oscuridad.
languages.original_text: This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.

traits.locale_text: Esta daga elegante, empapada en la sangre de santos mártires, encaja perfectamente en la mano. Su acero negro está tan pulido que el brillo reflejante del metal puede verse incluso en la oscuridad.

languages.text: 这把优雅的利刃在神圣殉道者的鲜血中淬炼过，刀柄完美贴合使用者的手掌。黑色的钢质刀身经过抛光，即便是在黑暗中，也能看到金属的反光。
languages.original_text: This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.

traits.locale_text: 这把优雅的利刃在神圣殉道者的鲜血中淬炼过，刀柄完美贴合使用者的手掌。黑色的钢质刀身经过抛光，即便是在黑暗中，也能看到金属的反光。

languages.text: この上品な刃は聖なる殉教者の血で作られていて、手に完璧にフィットする。黒い鋼は、暗闇でも金属が反射して見えるほどに、丁寧に磨かれている。
languages.original_text: This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.

traits.locale_text: この上品な刃は聖なる殉教者の血で作られていて、手に完璧にフィットする。黒い鋼は、暗闇でも金属が反射して見えるほどに、丁寧に磨かれている。

languages.text: Diese elegante Klinge, getränkt mit dem Blut heiliger Märtyrer, liegt perfekt in der Hand. Der schwarze Stahl wurde poliert, bis das spiegelnde Glitzern des Metalls selbst in der Dunkelheit zu sehen ist.
languages.original_text: This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.

traits.locale_text: Diese elegante Klinge, getränkt mit dem Blut heiliger Märtyrer, liegt perfekt in der Hand. Der schwarze Stahl wurde poliert, bis das spiegelnde Glitzern des Metalls selbst in der Dunkelheit zu sehen ist.

languages.text: Mübarek şehitlerin kanına batırılmış bu zarif kılıç, ele mükemmel bir şekilde oturur. Siyah çeliği, metalden yansıyan parıltı karanlıkta bile görünene dek cilalanmış.
languages.original_text: This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.
